type.name: org.gradle.plugin.devel.tasks.PluginUnderTestMetadata
type.description:
Custom task for generating the metadata for a plugin user test.
@since 2.13

method.name: getPluginClasspath
method.description: The code under test. Defaults to sourceSets.main.runtimeClasspath.

method.name: getOutputDirectory
method.description: The target output directory used for writing the classpath manifest. Defaults to "$buildDir/$task.name".

property.name: pluginClasspath
property.description: The code under test. Defaults to sourceSets.main.runtimeClasspath.

property.name: outputDirectory
property.description: The target output directory used for writing the classpath manifest. Defaults to "$buildDir/$task.name".
